mapper.select: SELECT log_id, users.username, log_desc, log_date FROM tbl_act_log AS logs INNER JOIN tbl_user AS users ON logs.emp_id = users.emp_id WHERE logs.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY logs.log_id DESC, logs.reg_date DESC LIMIT 8;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_act_log( emp_id, log_desc, log_date, reg_id ) VALUES ( #{emp_id}, #{log_desc}, #{log_date}, 1 );
